    • Method Detail

      • addCategoriesToSlaveCard

        void addCategoriesToSlaveCard(SlaveCard slaveCard,
                            Category category)
        Allow to add a forbidden category to a slave card. If the number of category are 0, the slave card are allow to rent all type of dvd.
        Parameters:
        slaveCard - the slave card
        category - the category to forbidden

      • addCategoriesToSlaveCard

        void addCategoriesToSlaveCard(SlaveCard slaveCard,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Category> categories)
        Allow to add multiple forbidden category to a slave card. If the number of category are 0, the slave card are allow to rent all type of dvd.
        Parameters:
        slaveCard - slaveCard the slave card
        categories - ArrayList<> of categories to add
